name: src/MockXKTModel.js
MockXKTModel

name: src/XKTEntity.js
XKTEntity
entityId
description:
Unique ID of this ````XKTEntity```` in {@link XKTModel#entities}.

For a BIM model, this will be an IFC product ID.

name: entityIndex
description: Index of this ````XKTEntity```` in {@link XKTModel#entitiesList};

name: matrix
description:
The 4x4 modeling transform matrix.

When the ````XKTEntity```` shares its {@link XKTPrimitive}s with other ````XKTEntity````s, this matrix is used to transform the
shared Primitives into World-space for this Entity. When this Entity does not share its ````XKTPrimitive````s,
then this matrix is ignored.

name: primitiveInstances
description: A list of {@link XKTPrimitiveInstance}s that indicate which {@link XKTPrimitive}s are used by this Entity.

name: aabb
description:
World-space axis-aligned bounding box (AABB) that encloses the {@link XKTPrimitive#positions} of
the {@link XKTPrimitive}s that are used by this ````XKTEntity````.

Set by {@link XKTModel#finalize}.

name: hasReusedPrimitives
description:
Indicates if this ````XKTEntity```` shares {@link XKTPrimitive}s with other {@link XKTEntity}'s.

Set by {@link XKTModel#finalize}.

Note that when an ````XKTEntity```` shares ````XKTPrimitives````, it shares **all** of its ````XKTPrimitives````. An ````XKTEntity````
never shares only some of its ````XKTPrimitives```` - it always shares either the whole set or none at all.

name: src/XKTModel.js
XKTModel
constructor
description: Constructs a new XKTModel.

params.name: cfg
params.description: Configuration

name: reusedPrimitivesDecodeMatrix
description:
The positions of all shared {@link XKTPrimitive}s are de-quantized using this singular
de-quantization matrix.

This de-quantization matrix is which is generated from the collective boundary of the
positions of all shared {@link XKTPrimitive}s.

name: primitives
description:
{@link XKTPrimitive}s within this XKTModel, each mapped to {@link XKTPrimitive#primitiveId}.

Created by {@link XKTModel#createPrimitive}.

name: primitivesList
description:
{@link XKTPrimitive}s within this XKTModel, in the order they were created.

Created by {@link XKTModel#createPrimitive}.

name: primitiveInstancesList
description:
{@link XKTPrimitiveInstance}s within this XKTModel, in the order they were created.

Created by {@link XKTModel#createEntity}.

name: entities
description:
{@link XKTEntity}s within this XKTModel, each mapped to {@link XKTEntity#entityId}.

Created by {@link XKTModel#createEntity}.

name: entitiesList
description:
{@link XKTEntity}s within this XKTModel, in the order they were created.

Created by {@link XKTModel#createEntity}.

name: tilesList
description:
{@link XKTTile}s within this Model.

Created by {@link XKTModel#finalize}.

name: finalized
description:
Indicates if this XKTModel has been finalized.

Set ````true```` by {@link XKTModel#finalize}.

name: createPrimitive
description:
Creates an {@link XKTPrimitive} within this XKTModel.

Logs error and does nothing if this XKTModel has been (see {@link XKTModel#finalized}).

params.name: params
params.description: Method parameters.

params.name: params.primitiveId
params.description: Unique ID for the {@link XKTPrimitive}.

params.name: params.primitiveType
params.description: The type of {@link XKTPrimitive}: "triangles", "lines" or "points"

params.name: params.matrix
params.description: Modeling matrix for the {@link XKTPrimitive}. Overrides ````position````, ````scale```` and ````rotation```` parameters.

params.name: params.position
params.description: Position of the {@link XKTPrimitive}. Overridden by the ````matrix```` parameter.

params.name: params.scale
params.description: Scale of the {@link XKTPrimitive}. Overridden by the ````matrix```` parameter.

params.name: params.rotation
params.description: Rotation of the {@link XKTPrimitive} as Euler angles given in degrees, for each of the X, Y and Z axis. Overridden by the ````matrix```` parameter.

params.name: params.color
params.description: RGB color for the {@link XKTPrimitive}, with each color component in range [0..1].

params.name: params.opacity
params.description: Opacity factor for the {@link XKTPrimitive}, in range [0..1].

params.name: params.positions
params.description: Floating-point Local-space vertex positions for the {@link XKTPrimitive}.

params.name: params.normals
params.description: Floating-point vertex normals for the {@link XKTPrimitive}.

params.name: params.indices
params.description: Triangle mesh indices for the {@link XKTPrimitive}.

name: createEntity
description:
Creates an {@link XKTEntity} within this XKTModel.

Logs error and does nothing if this XKTModel has been finalized (see {@link XKTModel#finalized}).

params.name: params
params.description: Method parameters.

params.name: params.entityId
params.description: Unique ID for the {@link XKTEntity}.

params.name: params.matrix
params.description: Modeling matrix for the {@link XKTEntity}. Overrides ````position````, ````scale```` and ````rotation```` parameters.

params.name: params.position
params.description: Position of the {@link XKTEntity}. Overridden by the ````matrix```` parameter.

params.name: params.scale
params.description: Scale of the {@link XKTEntity}. Overridden by the ````matrix```` parameter.

params.name: params.rotation
params.description: Rotation of the {@link XKTEntity} as Euler angles given in degrees, for each of the X, Y and Z axis. Overridden by the ````matrix```` parameter.

params.name: params.primitiveIds
params.description: IDs of {@link XKTPrimitive}s used by the {@link XKTEntity}.

name: finalize
description:
Finalizes this XKTModel.

After finalizing, we may then serialize the model to an array buffer using {@link writeXKTModelToArrayBuffer}.

Logs error and does nothing if this XKTModel has already been finalized.

Internally, this method:

* sets each {@link XKTEntity}'s {@link XKTEntity#hasReusedPrimitives} true if it shares its {@link XKTPrimitive}s with other {@link XKTEntity}s,
* creates each {@link XKTEntity}'s {@link XKTEntity#aabb},
* creates {@link XKTTile}s in {@link XKTModel#tilesList}, and
* sets {@link XKTModel#finalized} ````true````.

name: _createTileFromEntities
description:
Creates a tile from the given entities.

For each single-use {@link XKTPrimitive}, this method centers {@link XKTPrimitive#positions} to make them relative to the
tile's center, then quantizes the positions to unsigned 16-bit integers, relative to the tile's boundary.

name: src/XKTPrimitive.js
XKTPrimitive

params.name: primitiveId
params.description: Unique ID of the primitive in {@link XKTModel#primitives}.

params.name: primitiveType
params.description: Type of this primitive - "triangles" so far.

params.name: primitiveIndex
params.description: Index of this XKTPrimitive in {@link XKTModel#primitivesList}.

params.name: color
params.description: RGB color of this XKTPrimitive.

params.name: opacity
params.description: Opacity of this XKTPrimitive.

params.name: positions
params.description: Non-quantized 3D vertex positions.

params.name: normalsOctEncoded
params.description: Oct-encoded vertex normals.

params.name: indices
params.description: Indices to organize the vertex positions and normals into triangles.

params.name: edgeIndices
params.description: Indices to organize the vertex positions into edges.

name: primitiveId
description: Unique ID of this XKTPrimitive in {@link XKTModel#primitives}.

name: primitiveType
description: The type of primitive - "triangles" | "points" | "lines".

name: primitiveIndex
description: Index of this XKTPrimitive in {@link XKTModel#primitivesList}.

name: color
description: RGB color of this XKTPrimitive.

name: opacity
description: Opacity of this XKTPrimitive.

name: numInstances
description: The number of {@link XKTPrimitiveInstance}s that reference this XKTPrimitive.

name: positions
description: Non-quantized 3D vertex positions.

name: positionsQuantized
description:
Quantized vertex positions.

This array is later created from {@link XKTPrimitive#positions} by {@link XKTModel#finalize}.

name: normalsOctEncoded
description: Oct-encoded vertex normals.

name: indices
description: Indices that organize the vertex positions and normals as triangles.

name: edgeIndices
description: Indices that organize the vertex positions as edges.

name: reused
description: Convenience property that is ````true```` when {@link XKTPrimitive#numInstances} is greater that one.

name: src/XKTPrimitiveInstance.js
XKTPrimitiveInstance
primitiveInstanceIndex
description: Index of this PrimitiveInstance in {@link XKTModel#primitiveInstancesList};

name: primitive
description: The instanced {@link XKTPrimitive}.

name: entity
description: The owner {@link XKTEntity}.

XKTTile
constructor

description: Axis-aligned World-space bounding box that encloses the {@link XKTEntity}'s within this Tile.

description: 4x4 positions de-quantization matrix to decompress the shared {@link XKTPrimitive}s belonging to the {@link XKTEntity}'s within this Tile.

description: The {@link XKTEntity}'s within this XKTTile.

Only works in a browser that supports WebGL (1).

name: loadXKTModelFromGLTF
description:
Parses glTF JSON into an {@link XKTModel}.

Expects the XKTModel to be freshly instantiated, and calls {@link XKTModel#finalize} on the XKTModel before returning.

unknown.tagValue: {Promise} A Promise which returns the XKTModel when resolved.

params.name: gltf
params.description: The glTF JSON.

params.name: model
params.description: XKTModel to parse into

params.name: options.basePath
params.description: Base directory where binary attachments may be found.

return.description: A Promise which returns the XKTModel when resolved.

name: src/validateXKTArrayBuffer.js
validateXKTArrayBuffer
description: Validates an {@link ArrayBuffer} against the {@link XKTModel} it was written from.

unknown.tagValue: {Boolean} True if valid, else false. Logs validity failures to the JS console.

params.name: arrayBuffer
params.description: The {@link ArrayBuffer}.

params.name: xktModel
params.description: The {@link XKTModel} that the {@link ArrayBuffer} was written from.

return.description: True if valid, else false. Logs validity failures to the JS console.

name: src/writeXKTModelToArrayBuffer.js
writeXKTModelToArrayBuffer
description: Writes an {@link XKTModel} to an {@link ArrayBuffer}.

params.name: xktModel
params.description: The {@link XKTModel}.
